customer_reviews.title: Nice quality indoor grill and panini maker.
customer_reviews.text: Great indoor grill and panini maker. Gets hot very quickly and is easy to clean as the cooking surfaces are removable for cleaning. The grill does pull a lot of amps when you turn it on so make sure you have a good strong electrical circuit outlet. The price is very reasonable and fair for the high quality of the grill and the features. The temperature settings are a little hard to read as they are printed very faint on the control panel.
customer_reviews.author: D J L

customer_reviews.text: Heats up rather fast & cooks really good the only issue is that the gage numbers on the plate under knobs are lightly stamped. temperature are hard to see you have to a flash light to see the numbers because they literally put the colors in a gray color on black should’ve really been in white but that’s the only complaint I have about this item.

customer_reviews.title: This thing works great! It makes the best panini's ever
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great! It makes the best panini's ever. Simple to use, very attractive, extremely well made, and very high quality. You can grill meats and veggies on it too. Looks sharp, does a great job, food tastes wonderful, nothing to not like about it. Highly recommended.

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and so easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this unit. I've used it for fish, chicken, bacon and paninis. Worked perfectly at a variety of temperatures. Best part is it's so easy to clean. The plates pop out easily and go right in the dishwasher. That's always been my pet peeve: grill appliances that are a pain to clean. Not an issue with.this one. Only downside is it's a bit on the large side and takes up significant counter space. It is attractive though. Since I've been using it a couple times a week, I just keep it out. I don't have a grill, so this handy little unit will see a lot of service.
customer_reviews.author: lguidarini

customer_reviews.title: Family loves it!
customer_reviews.text: The DeLonghi Livenza is a great multipurpose grill/griddle. It's easy to assemble, easy to use and easy to clean. The controls are easy to comprehend and use. We've used it for everything from sandwiches, to panini's, to pancakes and continue to be impressed. I continue to recommended this unit to pretty much every one I know.
customer_reviews.author: Method2Madness

product_meta.title: DeLonghi America, CGH912C Indoor Grill, Silver
product_meta.description: The ultimate in versatility, the De'Longhi CGH912C Indoor Grill flawlessly cooks succulent steaks, perfect paninis or delicious fish. It features 2 sets of multi-purpose plates (2 grill and 2 griddle plates) that you can customize into five different cooking functions: Contact Grill, Panini Press, Full Grill, Full Griddle and Half Grill/Half Griddle. With the CGH921C, you'll have peace of mind in the kitchen because of the cool touch handles and the interchangeable plates that can be easily removed with the help of two release buttons on the side of the grill. The unique Durastone ceramic coating ensures an evenly heated cooking surface with no hot spots, and guarantees fast, even cooking resulting in food that's perfect all the way through. The large cooking surface accommodates multiple servings for your family and is ideal for entertaining a crowd, while the removable, dishwasher-safe plates allow for simple, hassle-free cleanup. With its stainless steel body, the De'Longhi CGH912C indoor grill is a thoughtfully designed, beautifully engineered indoor grill that will add style and function to your kitchen.
